type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.idea.IdeaModule
type.description: * Represents information about the IDEA module. * * @since 1.0-milestone-5

method.name: getCompilerOutput
method.description: * Returns information about idea compiler output (output dirs, inheritance of output dir, etc.) * * @since 1.0-milestone-5

method.name: getContentRoots
method.description: * All content roots. Most idea modules have a single content root. * * @return content roots * @since 1.0-milestone-5

method.name: getDependencies
method.description: * dependencies of this module (i.e. module dependencies, library dependencies, etc.) * * @return dependencies * @since 1.0-milestone-5

method.name: getGradleProject
method.description:
* The gradle project that is associated with this module. * Typically, a single module corresponds to a single gradle project. *

* See {@link HasGradleProject} * * @return associated gradle project * @since 1.0-milestone-5

method.name: getIdentifier
method.description: * The unique identifier for this IDEA module. * * @return The unique identifier for this IDEA module. * @since 2.14

method.name: getJavaLanguageSettings
method.description: * Returns the Java language settings for this element, or {@code null} if this element is not a Java element. * * @return The Java language settings. * @throws UnsupportedMethodException For Gradle versions older than 2.11, where this method is not supported. * @since 2.11

method.name: getParent
method.description: * Returns the project of this module. * Alias to {@link #getProject()} * * @return idea project * @since 1.0-milestone-5

method.name: getProject
method.description: * Returns the project of this module. * Alias to {@link #getParent()} * * @return idea project * @since 1.0-milestone-5

property.name: compilerOutput
property.description: * Returns information about idea compiler output (output dirs, inheritance of output dir, etc.) * * @since 1.0-milestone-5

property.name: contentRoots
property.description: * All content roots. Most idea modules have a single content root. * * @return content roots * @since 1.0-milestone-5

property.name: dependencies
property.description: * dependencies of this module (i.e. module dependencies, library dependencies, etc.) * * @return dependencies * @since 1.0-milestone-5

property.name: gradleProject
property.description:
* The gradle project that is associated with this module. * Typically, a single module corresponds to a single gradle project. *

* See {@link HasGradleProject} * * @return associated gradle project * @since 1.0-milestone-5

property.name: identifier
property.description: * The unique identifier for this IDEA module. * * @return The unique identifier for this IDEA module. * @since 2.14

property.name: javaLanguageSettings
property.description: * Returns the Java language settings for this element, or {@code null} if this element is not a Java element. * * @return The Java language settings. * @throws UnsupportedMethodException For Gradle versions older than 2.11, where this method is not supported. * @since 2.11

property.name: parent
property.description: * Returns the project of this module. * Alias to {@link #getProject()} * * @return idea project * @since 1.0-milestone-5

property.name: project
property.description: * Returns the project of this module. * Alias to {@link #getParent()} * * @return idea project * @since 1.0-milestone-5
